description: JOJI Frozen Yogurt & Sorbet offers A One of a Kind Self Serve Frozen Yogurt Truck, Banquet Catering and Delivery Services.JOJI blends love into cool flavors & toppings to create Super Duper Fro-Yo that ignites, then illuminates your senses. "Glow with the Fro-Yo!"At JOJI Yogurt, we pride ourselves on creating a Super Premium product. We only use fresh non-fat milk and yogurt in all of our offerings. Our flavors come from all natural ingredients.We have 29 toppings to choose from, some healthy, some, not so much, but all delicious.In addition to our Self Serve Frozen Yogurt and Puck Pops, we also make our own line of All Natural Doggie Fro Yo!We are also Official Partners of The Florida Panthers and the BB&T; CenterCheck out our New Store in the BB&T; Center at Section 114 - "The JOJI" - our Newest Creation, our Soft & Creamy JOJI® Frozen Yogurt with your choice of toppings Warmed & Sealed inside a Fluffy Vanilla Bun.
name: Joji Yogurt
